data.name: Second Quest Low%
data.rules:
Timing begins with control of Link on the Overworld. Timing ends with loss of control upon standing next to Zelda. 

This is a run that requires the player to complete the game with as few upgrades as possible. Only those required to win the game are permitted. When the game ends, the player should have only 3 hearts and wooden sword. 

Link must not acquire: 

Heart containers (Including Level 1 Aquamentus heart) 
Letter 
Blue Potion 
Red Potion 
Bomb Upgrades 
White Sword 
Magic Sword 
Blue Ring 
Red Ring 
Magic Shield 
Wooden Boomerang 
Magic Boomerang 
Wand 
Red Candle 
Book/Bible 
Magic Key

All runs must begin from system reset or power cycle.  Beginning from RETRY, SAVE, or CONTINUE is not permitted.
